name: 2024 7th International Conference on Sensors, Signal and Image Processing
content: Publication: All papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM ( ISBN: 979-8-4007-1742-0), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
organizers: Southern University of Science and Technology
